languages.text: {n}Абеляр стоически вздыхает и закатывает глаза. У вас возникает ощущение, что старый офицер не в первый и не во второй раз лично сталкивается с бюрократией Адептус Администратум.{/n}
{n}Abelard lets out a stoic sigh and rolls his eyes. You get the feeling that this is not his first personal interaction with the Administratum bureaucracy, nor is it his second.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр стоически вздыхает и закатывает глаза. У вас возникает ощущение, что старый офицер не в первый и не во второй раз лично сталкивается с бюрократией Адептус Администратум.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard lets out a stoic sigh and rolls his eyes. You get the feeling that this is not his first personal interaction with the Administratum bureaucracy, and neither is it his second.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard lets out a stoic sigh and rolls his eyes. You get the feeling that this is not his first personal interaction with the Administratum bureaucracy, nor is it his second.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Stoïque, Abélard soupire et lève les yeux au ciel. Vous sentez qu'il a déjà eu personnellement affaire aux bureaucrates de l'Administratum, et ce, à plus d'une occasion.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard lets out a stoic sigh and rolls his eyes. You get the feeling that this is not his first personal interaction with the Administratum bureaucracy, nor is it his second.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Stoïque, Abélard soupire et lève les yeux au ciel. Vous sentez qu'il a déjà eu personnellement affaire aux bureaucrates de l'Administratum, et ce, à plus d'une occasion.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラルドはストイックにため息をつき、目をぐるりと回す。アドミニストラトゥムの官僚と個人的に接するのはこれが初めてではないらしいことにあなたは気づいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard lets out a stoic sigh and rolls his eyes. You get the feeling that this is not his first personal interaction with the Administratum bureaucracy, nor is it his second.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドはストイックにため息をつき、目をぐるりと回す。アドミニストラトゥムの官僚と個人的に接するのはこれが初めてではないらしいことにあなたは気づいた。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德叹了口气，翻了个白眼。你有种感觉，他以前已经和内政部官僚打过很多次交道了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard lets out a stoic sigh and rolls his eyes. You get the feeling that this is not his first personal interaction with the Administratum bureaucracy, nor is it his second.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德叹了口气，翻了个白眼。你有种感觉，他以前已经和内政部官僚打过很多次交道了。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard stößt ein stoisches Seufzen aus und verdreht die Augen. Du hast das Gefühl, dass dies nicht seine erste persönliche Interaktion mit der Bürokratie des Administratums ist, und auch nicht seine zweite.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard lets out a stoic sigh and rolls his eyes. You get the feeling that this is not his first personal interaction with the Administratum bureaucracy, nor is it his second.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard stößt ein stoisches Seufzen aus und verdreht die Augen. Du hast das Gefühl, dass dies nicht seine erste persönliche Interaktion mit der Bürokratie des Administratums ist, und auch nicht seine zweite.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard suspira con estoicismo y pone los ojos en blanco. Tienes la impresión de que no es la primera vez que se enfrenta a la burocracia del Administratum. Ni la segunda.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard lets out a stoic sigh and rolls his eyes. You get the feeling that this is not his first personal interaction with the Administratum bureaucracy, nor is it his second.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard suspira con estoicismo y pone los ojos en blanco. Tienes la impresión de que no es la primera vez que se enfrenta a la burocracia del Administratum. Ni la segunda.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard, duygusuzca iç çekip gözlerini deviriyor. İçinden bir his, Abelard'ın daha önce Administratum bürokrasisiyle pek çok kez içli dışlı olduğunu söylüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard lets out a stoic sigh and rolls his eyes. You get the feeling that this is not his first personal interaction with the Administratum bureaucracy, nor is it his second.{/n}
